name: Alex Johnson
bio: Alex is a full-stack developer and AI enthusiast with over a decade of experience building scalable applications. He specializes in machine learning integrations and cloud architecture.

name: Samantha Lee
bio: Samantha is a frontend expert passionate about creating beautiful and performant user experiences. She is a core contributor to several open-source JavaScript frameworks.

name: David Chen
bio: David is a blockchain architect and a proponent of decentralized technologies. He focuses on smart contract security and the future of Web3 governance.

name: Maria Garcia
bio: Maria is a FinTech analyst and journalist who covers the intersection of finance, technology, and regulation. Her work provides insights into the future of money.
